duties_responsibilities.duty: Maintain company financial records, monthly billing, accounts receivable, and accounts payable.
Handle payroll, payroll taxes, and quarterly payroll tax reports.
Invoicing, personnel payroll records, and business reports.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Accounting or Finance or related field required. Minimum five (5) to Seven (7) years of experience working in a combination of bookkeeping, payroll, AP/AR, senior-level position required.Advanced knowledge of Generally Accepted Accounting Principles (GAAP) and accounting software required.
